# Contact us

We'd love to hear from you to see how Apify can help.

Contact sales

Looking for a custom web scraping solution?

[Let's talk](/contact-sales)

Partnerships

[Apply now](/partners/join)

Do you have questions about Apify or need assistance?

Open chat

Community

Want to talk with other Apify developers?

## Where to find us

Apify is based in the Czech Republic, the beautiful heart of Europe.

### Prague headquarters 

Apify Technologies s.r.o.  
**Lucerna Palace**  
Vodickova 704/36, 110 00 Prague 1, Czech Republic  
  
To get to our office:

  1. Go to the Lucerna passage from Vodickova street.
  2. On the left-hand side (opposite Lucerna Music Bar), you'll see a glass door.
  3. Ring the "Apify" bell, then go to the 7th floor.



[View on Google Maps](https://goo.gl/maps/1gtAdLE4F4bS28Eg7)

### Brno office

Our smaller office in the Czech Republic's second largest city.  
  


**Titanium Brno**  
Nove Sady 25  
602 00 Brno  
Czech Republic

[View on Google Maps](https://maps.app.goo.gl/pKFuvcxj4A4V64Mt9)

## Stay updated

Never miss out on updates and new features—follow Apify on our social media and content channels.

[**Twitter**](https://x.com/apify)[**LinkedIn**](https://www.linkedin.com/company/10608457/)[**YouTube**](https://www.youtube.com/apify)[**Newsletter**](https://www.linkedin.com/newsletters/pro-web-scraping-7133073105995845632/)[**GitHub**](https://github.com/apify)[**Apify Blog**](https://blog.apify.com/)[**Spotify**](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/2ACQfU4ER1f9zh4kgKoIrW)[**Events calendar**](https://lu.ma/apify)
